entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
